name: Air Transat A330-243 "Azores Glider" [C-GITS] Takeoff from Calgary ᴴᴰ
description:
Happy HAF! For today's video we have the infamous "Azores glider" departing Calgary International Airport for London Gatwick, shot back in January. I know it's a lousy viewpoint, but I had to catch it. Hope you enjoy, and stay tuned for some San Diego action tomorrow :)

Thanks for watching! Please comment, rate, and subscribe!
